# emailAddress

**Instance Property**

The recipient of an email to send when the alarm triggers.

## Declaration

```swift
var emailAddress: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Assigning this property a value will set the [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKAlarm/soundName] and [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKAlarm/url] properties to `nil`.

## Triggering Alarm Actions

- **EKAlarmType**: A value that specifies what type of action occurs when the alarm triggers.
- **type**: The type of action to trigger when the alarm fires.
- **soundName**: The name of the sound to play when the alarm triggers.
